#2)
rating <- choco$Rating
year <- choco$Review.Date
tab <- table(year)
chart <-as.data.frame(tab)
year <- (2006:2017)
barplot(chart$Freq, names.arg = year, main = 'Ratings per Year', xlab = 'Year', ylab = 'Number of Ratings')
